results.description: The opening round of 2020 Super League fixtures includes a repeat of the 2019 Grand Final between St Helens and Salford.
results.shortTitle: Saints start 2020 season against Salford
results.title: Super League 2020 fixtures: St Helens start v Salford, Toronto open v Castleford

thumbnail.altText: St Helens lift the Super League Grand Final trophy

results.description: Super League Grand Finalists St Helens and Salford will meet again when Magic Weekend returns to Newcastle in May 2020.
results.shortTitle: Grand Final repeat on Magic Weekend
results.title: Magic Weekend: St Helens and Salford to meet in Grand Final repeat

results.description: Catalans Dragons re-sign half-back Josh Drinkwater on a two-year deal following his departure from Hull KR.
results.shortTitle: Catalans re-sign half-back Drinkwater
results.title: Josh Drinkwater: Catalans re-sign former London Broncos, Leigh & Hull KR half-back

results.description: Hull Kingston Rovers sign Daniel Murray on a one-year deal, as Ryan Lannon goes the other way to rejoin Salford Red Devils.
results.shortTitle: Salford & Hull KR swap Murray & Lannon
results.title: Daniel Murray and Ryan Lannon: Salford Red Devils and Hull KR in swap deal

results.description: Hull KR sign Joe Keyes, Rowan Milnes, Elliot Minchella, Matthew Storton and Anesu Mudoti from Bradford Bulls.
results.shortTitle: Hull KR sign five from Bradford Bulls
results.title: Hull KR sign Keyes, Milnes, Minchella, Stourton & Mudoti from Bradford Bulls

results.description: Ex-Wigan and Hull KR second-row Joel Tomkins follows brother Sam to Catalans Dragons by signing a two-year deal in Perpignan.
results.shortTitle: Joel Tomkins joins brother Sam at Catalans
results.title: Joel Tomkins: Catalans sign ex-Hull KR and Wigan second-row on two-year deal

results.description: Hull KR sign Leeds Rhinos hooker Matt Parcell on a one-year deal after a spell with Rovers on loan.
results.shortTitle: Hull KR sign Leeds hooker Parcell
results.title: Matt Parcell: Hull KR sign Leeds Rhinos hooker on one-year contract

results.description: Hull Kingston Rovers give a new contract to loose-forward Kyle Trout for the 2020 Super League campaign.
results.shortTitle: Trout signs Hull KR contract for 2020
results.title: Kyle Trout: Hull KR to keep forward for 2020 campaign

thumbnail.altText: Kyle Trout in action for Hull KR

results.description: Hull Kingston Rovers sign versatile back Nick Rawsthorne on a two-year contract from Toronto Wolfpack.
results.shortTitle: Hull KR sign Rawsthorne from Toronto
results.title: Nick Rawsthorne: Hull KR sign Toronto Wolfpack back

thumbnail.altText: Nick Rawsthorne in action for Toronto Wolfpack
Nick Rawsthorne in action for Toronto Wolfpack
Nick Rawsthorne in action for Toronto Wolfpack
Nick Rawsthorne in action for Toronto Wolfpack

results.description: Hull Kingston Rovers sign forward Will Maher on a two-year contract from Super League rivals Castleford Tigers.
results.shortTitle: Hull KR sign Castleford forward Maher
results.title: Will Maher: Hull KR sign Castleford forward

results.description: Hull KR assistant coach James Webster leaves, with Willie Poching returning to the Super League club.
results.shortTitle: Poching in for Webster at Hull KR
results.title: James Webster: Hull KR assistant coach replaced by Willie Poching

results.description: Hull KR make London Broncos back-rower Matty Gee their seventh signing for the 2020 Super League season.
results.shortTitle: Gee leaves Broncos to join Hull KR
results.title: Matty Gee: Hull KR sign back-rower from London Broncos on one-year deal

results.description: Warrington Wolves back-rower Harvey Livett rejoins the Wire's Super League rivals Hull KR on a season-long loan.
results.shortTitle: Warrington's Livett rejoins Hull KR
results.title: Harvey Livett: Warrington Wolves back-rower rejoins Hull KR on season-long loan

results.description: Super League side Hull KR sign Bradford Bulls winger Ethan Ryan on a two-year deal.
results.shortTitle: Hull KR sign Bradford winger Ryan
results.title: Ethan Ryan: Hull KR sign Bradford Bulls winger on two-year deal

results.description: London Broncos' James Cunningham is cleared of racial abuse after a tribunal rules there was "not enough evidence to prove guilt".
results.shortTitle: Cunningham not guilty of racial abuse
results.title: James Cunningham: London Broncos hooker cleared of racial abuse

results.description: Hull KR re-sign half-back Jordan Abdull from relegated Super League side London Broncos.
results.shortTitle: Hull KR re-sign Abdull from London
results.title: Jordan Abdull: Half-back re-joins Hull KR from London Broncos

results.description: Hull Kingston Rovers sign ex-New Zealand centre Shaun Kenny-Dowall from NRL side Newcastle Knights on a two-year deal.
results.shortTitle: Hull KR sign Kiwi centre Kenny-Dowall
results.title: Shaun Kenny-Dowall: Hull KR sign Kiwi centre on two-year deal

results.description: Hull KR accept captain Joel Tomkins' request to leave the club on compassionate grounds.
results.shortTitle: Tomkins exits Hull KR by mutual consent
results.title: Joel Tomkins: Hull KR accept captain's request to leave on compassionate grounds

results.description: Hull KR winger Ryan Shaw leaves after four seasons to join Championship rugby union side Yorkshire Carnegie.
results.shortTitle: Shaw leaves Hull KR for rugby union
results.title: Ryan Shaw: Hull KR winger switches codes to join Yorkshire Carnegie

results.description: Krisnan Inu kicks a Golden Point drop-goal to help Salford take third place by beating Hull KR, who stay safe.
results.shortTitle: Salford win to finish third as Hull KR survive
results.title: Super League: Krisnan Inu's Golden Point drop-goal helps Salford sneak third place by beating Hull KR

thumbnail.altText: Former Leeds Rhinos legend Danny McGuire made a losing final appearance in rugby league for Hull KR
